description: This schema represents a generic question with multiple answers possible taken from a value set.

answer.description: Define the answer cardinality: one only or multiple. If the latter, the answer is an array of answer type (see generic-question-by-answer-type template for details).

oneOf.description: Define the item type, for ex., string, number, enum of code/text pairs (object), like 'code': 1, 'text': 'not useful'

items.description: Define the item type, for ex., string, number, enum of code/text pairs (object), like 'code': 1, 'text': 'not useful'

date_time.description: Create one property for each of the question-level timestamp you need: for ex.,  date_time_asked, date_time_answered.
